home.title: Home
games.crocodile.title: Crocodile
games.crocodile.description:
Word guessing game.
You can play in teams or individually.
Each team or player takes turns trying to guess the word or phrase.
The person showing is not allowed to speak, only to gesture, show, represent.
The team or player that correctly guesses the word or phrase gets a point and takes the place of the explainer.
The team or player with the most points at the end of the game wins
